justification: Trade suits Team A (Tier 1 QB upgrade, pass-catching TE), but shows little regard for Team B’s mindset or needs. B likely values rookie Brandon Taylor and has TE injuries (Walker doubtful, Gonzalez Q), making Taylor crucial. Asking for B’s Tier 1 QB plus that TE for an out Tier 4 QB and a Tier 4 WR is lopsided. Minimal rationale, no explicit modeling of B’s risk/rookie preferences or stacking goals.
